name: Onosmodium
Modalities: Better: when lying down on back

Eyes: Eyes heavy and dull, muscular asthenopia; ocular muscles tense
Vision blurred; optic disc hyperemic, and retinal vessels enlarged
Strained feeling in eyes; worse, using eyes
Pain in eyeballs between orbit and ball, extending to left temple
Head: Occipitofrontal pain in morning on waking, chiefly left side
Dull, heavy, dizzy, pressing upward in occiput
Confused
Pain in temples and mastoid
Nose feels dry
Loss of memory
Chest: Pain in heart; pulse, rapid, irregular, weak
Sore, aching in breasts; feels swollen and sore
Back: Numbness and tingling in feet and legs
Pain in dorsal and lumbar regions
Female: Severe uterine pains; bearing-down pains; old pains return
Menses too early and too prolonged
Feels as if menses would appear
Abdomen: Craving for ice-water and cold drinks; wants to drink often
Extremities: Tired and numb feeling in legs, popliteal spaces, and below knees

details: A remedy for MIGRAINE. Headaches from eyestrain and sexual weakness. It produces diminution of sexual desire in both sexes; hence its homoeopathicity, in SEXUAL NEURASTHENIA. Depressed or lost sexual life in women. Neuralgic pains. General prostration. Acts as if born tired.Want of power of concentration and coordination. Vertigo, numbness and muscular prostration. Marked association of head and eye symptoms, with muscular tiredness and weariness.
